properties.name: by.sakuuj.elasticsearch.index-creator.uri
properties.description: URI to send index creation queries on. Should be of a pattern: http://(host):(port).

properties.name: by.sakuuj.elasticsearch.index-creator.password
properties.description: Elasticsearch password to use when trying to create indexes.

properties.name: by.sakuuj.elasticsearch.index-creator.username
properties.description: Elasticsearch username to use when trying to create indexes.

properties.name: by.sakuuj.elasticsearch.index-creator.authentication
properties.description: Type of authentication to use when sending REST queries to Elasticsearch.

properties.name: by.sakuuj.elasticsearch.index-creator.run-on-startup
properties.description: Whether to enable CommandLineRunner that automatically performs index creation.

properties.name: by.sakuuj.elasticsearch.index-creator.enable
properties.description: Whether to enable index creator, that is used to create indexes from json files provided.
